CompanyFacade - Class in coupon.sys.core.facade
This class implements all the business logic associated with the company It has three attributes: one of type CompanyDao and the other of type couponDaoDB and a relevant company (since a company performs the actions)

The constructor initialize the couponDaoDb and companyDaoDb and the company attributes

Coupon - Class in coupon.sys.core.beans
* @author Yehuda.Hizmi the class is a coupon template it has two constructors: 1.
Coupon(long, String, Date, Date, int, CouponType, String, double, String) - Constructor for class coupon.sys.core.beans.Coupon
 
Coupon(String, Date, Date, int, CouponType, String, double, String) - Constructor for class coupon.sys.core.beans.Coupon
The constructor has no id parameter since it is auto given
coupon.sys.core.beans - package coupon.sys.core.beans
This package all the classes in project The classes are: Company, Customer, Coupon and one Enum class of Coupon Type
coupon.sys.core.configuration - package coupon.sys.core.configuration
At this configuration Package there are properties which commonly used in the program.
coupon.sys.core.connection - package coupon.sys.core.connection
This package handle connection in the system.
coupon.sys.core.coupon.system - package coupon.sys.core.coupon.system
This package handle one singelton class which provides one instance of the system.
coupon.sys.core.dao - package coupon.sys.core.dao
This pachage defines all the Dao (Data Access Object) intefaces for the coupon system.
coupon.sys.core.dao.db - package coupon.sys.core.dao.db
This package holds a concrete classes - implementations of all the methods of the abstract classes.
coupon.sys.core.dao.db.utils - package coupon.sys.core.dao.db.utils
At this package a general and supporting methods are implemented:
1.Emailing Process package - holds method that build and sends an email to the administrator every 24 hours
2.GeneralMethods package - has one method wich generate the current date without the time
3.TableBuilder package - has one method that build a table with all the deleted coupons
coupon.sys.core.exceptions - package coupon.sys.core.exceptions
This package defines the exceptions in the system.
By default there is one general exception ("CouponSystemException") which is thrown with the original exception as parameter
coupon.sys.core.facade - package coupon.sys.core.facade
This package contains 1 abstract class called "Client Facade" and 3 concrete classes that should have implemented the login method in the ClientFacade class.
Since the login method was implemented in CompanyDaoDb and in the CustomerDaoDb this class is irrelevant
coupon.sys.core.sub.processes - package coupon.sys.core.sub.processes
This package has one class that responsibale for the Coupon Expiration thread
coupon.sys.mainTest - package coupon.sys.mainTest
This package contains collaborative tests.
It has 7 threads that run together and test all the methods and the connection pool.
It has:
1.
coupon.sys.mainTestByRole - package coupon.sys.mainTestByRole
This package contains tests file according to Roles
1.

CouponType - Enum in coupon.sys.core.beans
 
createCompany(Company) - Method in interface coupon.sys.core.dao.CompanyDao
This method insert a new company into the data base (Company table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
createCompany(Company) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
 
createCompany(Company) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.facade.AdminFacade
This method activate the createCompany at the companyDaoDB class.
createCompanyCouponRecord(long, long) - Method in interface coupon.sys.core.dao.CompanyDao
This method insert a record into Company Coupon table every time a company creates a new coupon Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
createCompanyCouponRecord(long, long) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
 
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface coupon.sys.core.dao.CouponDao
This method insert a new coupon into the data base (Coupon table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CouponDaoDb
 
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.facade.CompanyFacade
This method activate the createCoupon method at the couponDaoDb class It gets a coupon object to create as a parameter.
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface coupon.sys.core.dao.CustomerDao
This method insert a new customer into the data base (Customer table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CustomerDaoDB
 
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.facade.AdminFacade
This method activate the createCustomer at the customerDaoDB class.
createCustomerCouponRecord(long, long) - Method in interface coupon.sys.core.dao.CustomerDao
This method insert a record into Customer Coupon table every time a customer purchase a new coupon Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
